languages.text: "Ты начинаешь понимать, как живут в Прорве, людишко. Думай о будущем, а не о прошлом, и не верь никому".

traits.locale_text: "Ты начинаешь понимать, как живут в Прорве, людишко. Думай о будущем, а не о прошлом, и не верь никому".
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "You're starting to understand how we do things here in the Chasm, humanling. Think about the future, not the past, and trust no one."
languages.original_text: "Ты начинаешь понимать, как живут в Прорве, людишко. Думай о будущем, а не о прошлом, и не верь никому".

traits.locale_text: "You're starting to understand how we do things here in the Chasm, humanling. Think about the future, not the past, and trust no one."

languages.text: “你已经开始明白裂隙这里的生活方式了，小人儿。别考虑过去，多想想未来，不要相信任何人。”
languages.original_text: "You're starting to understand how we do things here in the Chasm, humanling. Think about the future, not the past, and trust no one."

traits.locale_text: “你已经开始明白裂隙这里的生活方式了，小人儿。别考虑过去，多想想未来，不要相信任何人。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «Empiezas a entender cómo hacemos las cosas en el Abismo, human{mf|o|a}. Pensar en el futuro, no en el pasado, y no confiar en nadie».
languages.original_text: "You're starting to understand how we do things here in the Chasm, humanling. Think about the future, not the past, and trust no one."

traits.locale_text: «Empiezas a entender cómo hacemos las cosas en el Abismo, human{mf|o|a}. Pensar en el futuro, no en el pasado, y no confiar en nadie».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「裂け目での生き方がどういうものかわかってきたようだな、人間。過去を振り返らず、未来を見据えて、誰一人信じるな」
languages.original_text: "You're starting to understand how we do things here in the Chasm, humanling. Think about the future, not the past, and trust no one."

traits.locale_text: 「裂け目での生き方がどういうものかわかってきたようだな、人間。過去を振り返らず、未来を見据えて、誰一人信じるな」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Ihr begreift langsam, wie wir hier in der Kluft leben, Menschling. Denkt an die Zukunft, nicht an die Vergangenheit, und vertraut niemandem."
languages.original_text: "You're starting to understand how we do things here in the Chasm, humanling. Think about the future, not the past, and trust no one."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr begreift langsam, wie wir hier in der Kluft leben, Menschling. Denkt an die Zukunft, nicht an die Vergangenheit, und vertraut niemandem."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Vous commencez à comprendre comment ça se passe dans l'Abîme, {mf|humain|humaine}. Pensez à l'avenir plutôt qu'au passé et ne faites confiance à personne. »
languages.original_text: "You're starting to understand how we do things here in the Chasm, humanling. Think about the future, not the past, and trust no one."

traits.locale_text: « Vous commencez à comprendre comment ça se passe dans la Faille, {mf|humain|humaine}. Pensez à l'avenir plutôt qu'au passé et ne faites confiance à personne. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Yarık'ta işlerin nasıl yürüdüğünü anlamaya başlamışsın insancık. Geçmişi değil, geleceği düşün. Kimseye de güvenme."
languages.original_text: "You're starting to understand how we do things here in the Chasm, humanling. Think about the future, not the past, and trust no one."

traits.locale_text: "Yarık'ta işlerin nasıl yürüdüğünü anlamaya başlamışsın insancık. Geçmişi değil, geleceği düşün. Kimseye de güvenme."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
